articles.description: President Donald Trump is tearing the Republican Party apart on his way out the door, forcing Republicans to choose sides as they wrestle with the future of the party in the wake of Trump's overt attempts to subvert the results of the election.

articles.title: Carl Bernstein: This is the ultimate smoking gun tape
articles.description: Legendary Watergate journalist Carl Bernstein reacts to audio obtained by the Washington Post of President Donald Trump pushing Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger to "find" votes to overturn the election results in the state.

articles.author: Mitchell McCluskey, CNN
articles.title: Gerry Marsden, lead singer of Gerry and the Pacemakers, dies at 78
articles.description: Gerry Marsden, lead singer of the 1960s British rock band Gerry and the Pacemakers, has died of a heart infection at 78, his friend and radio broadcaster Pete Price announced Sunday.

articles.author: Paul Gittings, CNN
articles.title: Covid-hit Manchester City cruises to win at struggling Chelsea
articles.description: Manchester City shrugged off the loss of six players to Covid-19 to beat Chelsea 3-1 on Sunday to reignite its English Premier League title challenge.

articles.author: Ryan Nobles and Alex Rogers, CNN
articles.title: Electoral College objection serves as another example of Trump putting Loeffler and Perdue in tight spot
articles.description: Republican Sens. David Perdue and Kelly Loeffler have spent the entire Georgia Senate runoffs running as close as they can to Donald Trump, while at the same time avoiding a complete adoption of Trump's baseless conspiracy theories about electoral fraud.

articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: Fanduel suffers widespread outage on last day of NFL's regular season
articles.description: Fanduel, the fantasy sports and online sports betting company, experienced outages on Sunday — the last day of regular season NFL games — preventing many of its customers from accessing its Sportsbook platform.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: 'Ratatouille: The TikTok Musical' has raised over $1 million for struggling actors
articles.description: The online sensation that became "Ratatouille: The TikTok Musical" has raised over $1 million for the Actors Fund organization and struggling performers impacted by the pandemic.

articles.author: Alexis Benveniste, CNN Business
articles.title: Media should call GOP election fight an attempted coup, historian says
articles.description: The Republican effort to contest the presidential election results on the Senate floor this week is raising questions about how media outlets should cover the moment, and whether the Trump-supported action should be called an attempted "coup."

articles.author: Paul Gittings, CNN
articles.title: Petra Vlhova crowned 'Snow Queen' as Mikaela Shiffrin takes fourth
articles.description: Slovakia's Petra Vlhova was crowned "Snow Queen" of Zagreb for the second straight year after claiming the World Cup slalom event as four-time winner Mikaela Shiffrin finished back in fourth.

articles.title: Tapper presses Ossoff on false attack on Loeffler
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper tells Democratic Senate candidate Jon Ossoff of Georgia that his recent attack on Senator Loeffler on the campaign trail is not true.

articles.title: The creation of these chicken nuggets could have worldwide impacts
articles.description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria looks at the impact cultured meat could have after a start-up company says they created lab-grown meat through a biological process similar to brewing beer.

articles.title: Police arrest 2 people and fine 6 for violating Quebec's Covid-19 lockdown orders at a 7-person house party
articles.description: Canadian police arrested two people after an illegal New Year's Eve party violated Quebec's Covid-19 lockdown protocols.
